title: UX Writer
content:
If you shop online (and who doesn’t these days?), then chances are you’ve already interacted with Yotpo. We’re a leading eCommerce retention marketing platform, on a mission to help brands of all sizes turn one-time shoppers into customers for life. Loyalty programs, SMS and email marketing, subscriptions, and reviews are our bread and butter, but we have more solutions up our sleeve, too.
We have teams across the world, including the US, Canada, UK, Israel, Bulgaria, and Australia — and we’re still growing. Our primary goal is to deliver the best technology in the industry.
You can hear all about it in our latest brand video. 
Sounds exciting? Then read on, because we’re in pursuit of the best and the brightest minds to help us achieve our vision.We are looking for a talented UX Writer to join our Product Content team.
UX Writers at Yotpo help define the user experience for our 5 Yotpo product lines, delivering high-quality messaging based on our Content Design System, business objectives, and overall UX philosophies. This includes actively participating in early discovery sessions and research, then driving the writing process through iteration, testing, handoff, and content QA.
You’ll be expected to design and deliver in-product language, product flows, content frameworks, navigation and more.
 
Responsibilities:
 

Design, write, edit and test clear, compelling in-product microcopy
Own every stage of the content cycle, from product and customer research to shipping perfect copy
Help build and maintain our Content Design System
Share work and give feedback to teammates to ensure a consistent user experience
Collaborate with Product Managers, Product Designers, Developers, and other stakeholders
Juggle multiple projects at once, while prioritizing your tasks and meeting tight deadlines

 
Requirements:
 

Native-level English with at least 3 years experience in a content design/UX writing role at a tech company
Passionate about writing and excellent UX, and a critical thinker with an eye for detail
Team player who can give and take feedback constructively
Ability to independently lead a content domain and manage multiple competing priorities in a fast-paced, constantly changing environment
Quick learner, with a good grasp of technical concepts

 

What we offer:

Track to success – work in a dynamic organization with ambient and laid-back office atmosphere + best coffee in town
Individualised career development, rewards and recognition.
Work-life balance – 25 days paid vacation with add-ons for loyalty, regular team buildings and celebrations in and outside the country
Additional health insurance package
Internal mobility program and refer-a-friend program
Managing a fixed monthly budget for social benefits thru Re:Benefit – a flexible online benefits solution
Food vouchers – monthly
E-learning portals and knowledge sharing sessions.
Company backed Hackathons, Tech conferences, workshops events, etc
Stocked kitchen and bar.
Equity in options.
We are now working in a flexible hybrid capacity.

Only short-listed candidates will be contacted.
